data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Streymoyar, Faroe Islands know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Streymoyar, Faroe Islands
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Streymoyar, Faroe Islands. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next week in Streymoyar, Faroe Islands.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, the believers in the state of Streymoyar, Faroe Islands need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Streymoyar, Faroe Islands to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Hoyvík
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Hoyvík, Streymoyar, Faroe Islands.
Spirit, help the 8,379 believers in Streymoyar to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Streymoyar, Faroe Islands to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary:
the state of Streymoyar, Faroe Islands has a population of 25,400.

We estimate Streymoyar has 8,379 people who might know Jesus, 14,711 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,309 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Streymoyar.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.
